jdbcService.sql: update component_attachment set db_modified_utc = timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), content_types = case when :contentTypes is null then content_types else :contentTypes end, max_size = case when :maxSize is null then max_size else :maxSize end, min_occurs = case when :minOccurs is null then min_occurs else :minOccurs end, max_occurs = case when :maxOccurs is null then max_occurs else :maxOccurs end, role_id = case when :roleId is null then role_id else :roleId end, component_id = case when :componentId is null then component_id else :componentId end where id = :id
